initiatives.title: Job Matching Portal
initiatives.description: Create an online platform that connects women and young girls with equal employment opportunities, fostering career growth and eliminating biases.

initiatives.title: Skill Development Programs
initiatives.description: Offer skill development and training programs tailored to industries with gender disparities, ensuring women have the necessary qualifications for various roles.

initiatives.title: Workplace Inclusion Initiatives
initiatives.description: Collaborate with companies to implement policies that support workplace inclusion, diversity, and gender-neutral recruitment practices.
